name: Starlight: Escape
description:
__________

Starlight Escape is an adventure of Starlight who is the keeper of the Stars. Recently many of the stars had escaped while she wasn't looking. Now its up to her to return them. Help starlight navigate through the difference areas and watch out for the black holes or you'll be sent back in time. 

This cute 2-d Pixel art platformer game surrounded by stars and space is waiting for you!!

___________

Made by StarlightZen
Solo Project: Roczen Juan
